rows.Name: NO_ERROR
rows.Comment: No error

rows.Name: TCP_INIT_ERROR
rows.Comment: Unable to initialize the TCP socket

rows.Name: TCP_READ_ERROR
rows.Comment: Error while reading response

rows.Name: TCP_WRITE_ERROR
rows.Comment: Error while sending the request

rows.Name: MAX_RESPONSE_SIZE_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
Size of incoming packet exceeds the maximum packet size. See
MQTTParam.g_udiMaxPacketSize

rows.Name: DECODE_REMAINING_LENGTH_MALFORMED
rows.Comment: Malformation during Decoding of Remaining Length of Packet

rows.Name: RESPONSE_PACKET_EMPTY
rows.Comment: The Response Packet is empty

rows.Name: INVALID_PACKET_TYPE
rows.Comment: Invalid Packet Type in first byte of Fixed Header

rows.Name: INVALID_PACKET_BIT_FLAGS
rows.Comment: Invalid Packet Bit Flags in first byte of Fixed Header

rows.Name: INVALID_PACKET
rows.Comment: Invalid Packet

rows.Name: KEEP_ALIVE_TIME_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment: Keep Alive Time is too much

rows.Name: WRONG_SESSION_PRESENT_CONNACK
rows.Comment: Wrong Session Present in CONNACK packet

rows.Name: UNACCEPTABLE_PROTOCOL_VERION
rows.Comment:
Connection to Broker is Refused, because of Unacceptable
Protocol Version

rows.Name: IDENTIFIER_REJECTED
rows.Comment:
Connection to Broker is Refused, because of Rejection of
Client Identifier

rows.Name: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE
rows.Comment:
Connection to Broker is Refused, because the Server Broker
is not available

rows.Name: BAD_USER_NAME_PASSWORD
rows.Comment:
Connection to Broker is Refused, because of Bad User name or
Bad Password

rows.Name: NOT_AUTHORIZED
rows.Comment:
Connection to Broker is Refused, because of Not Authorized
access

rows.Name: TOPIC_FILTER_EMPTY
rows.Comment:
Topic Filter is empty ââ, MUST be at least one character
long

rows.Name: TOPIC_NAME_NOT_ALLOWED_WILDCARD
rows.Comment:
Topic Name contains Wildcards, what is not allowed. Only
Topic Filter can contain these

rows.Name: TOPIC_INVALID_LENGTH
rows.Comment: Topic Length out of valid range (valid range: 1 - 1024)

rows.Name: TOPIC_IS_EMPTY
rows.Comment: Topic name is empty

rows.Name: SUBSCRIBE_FAILURE
rows.Comment: Subscription Failure

rows.Name: ADD_MQTT_PACKET_COLLECTION_ERROR
rows.Comment:
Collection Error while trying to add a mqtt packet to the
stack

rows.Name: ADD_SUBSCRIBER_COLLECTION_ERROR
rows.Comment:
Collection Error while trying to add a subscriber to the
stack

rows.Name: REMOVE_SUBSCRIBER_COLLECTION_ERROR
rows.Comment:
Collection Error while trying to remove a subscriber from
the stack

rows.Name: ACKNOWLEDGE_TIMEOUT
rows.Comment:
Client waits for ping response from Server, but Server does
not response within a given time interval (2 * ping
interval)

rows.Name: ALLOCATED_PAYLOAD_SIZE_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
The Size of the received payload is more than given
allocated memory

rows.Name: MAX_NUMBER_OF_PACKETS_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment: The maximum size of packets has been exceeded

rows.Name: CAN_NOT_ADD_ELEMENT_TO_QUEUE
rows.Comment:
Can not add the element to queue (maybe the maximum size has
been exceeded)

rows.Name: QUERYINTERFACE_ERROR
rows.Comment: Call of function __QUERYINTERFACE failed (internal error)

rows.Name: TIME_OUT
rows.Comment: Action returned with timeout error.

rows.Name: INVALID_LICENSE
rows.Comment: No valid license found or demo mode has expired.

rows.Name: CLIENT_NOT_CONNECTED
rows.Comment: The MQTT client is not connected to a broker.

rows.Name: RESOLVE_HOSTNAME_FAILED
rows.Comment: The hostname can not be resolved.

rows.Name: MAX_REQUEST_SIZE_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
Size of publish packet packet exceeds the maximum packet
size

rows.Name: UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
rows.Comment: Unsupported MQTT version

rows.Name: OPERATION_NOT_SUCCESSFUL
rows.Comment:
The operation was not successful. See eReasonCode for more
information. (MQTT V5 only)

rows.Name: SEND_QUOTA_LIMIT_REACHED
rows.Comment:
The send quota limit has been reached. Try to publish the
message later.

rows.Name: INVALID_REASON_CODE
rows.Comment: The reason code is not allowed in this context.

rows.Name: MAX_RECEIVE_BUFFER_SIZE_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
Size of incoming packets exceeds the maximum size of the
receive buffer. See MQTTParam.g_udiMaxReceiveBufferSize

rows.Name: MAX_TOPIC_LEVEL_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment: The maximum topic level has been exceeded.

rows.Name: MAX_STRING_LENGTH_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
The maximum length of a STRING has been exceeded (Maximum
length: 1024).

rows.Name: MAX_CORRELATION_DATA_LENGTH_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
The maximum size of Correlation Data has been exceeded. See
MQTTParam.g_udiMaxCorrelationDataSize

rows.Name: MAX_NUMBER_OF_PUBLISHER_AND_SUBSCRIBER_EXCEEDED
rows.Comment:
The maximum number of publishers and subscribers has been
exceeded. See MQTTParam.g_udiMaxPublishersAndSubscribers
